articles.description: Roy Hann, a nurse practitioner at Dundee's Ninewells Hospital, is quarantined with wife Emma and 10 of their kids because there's not enough space to self-isolate at their five-bedroom home.
articles.content:
A dad of 13 kids has told how his whole household has to be quarantined after he was diagnosed with COVID-19.
Roy Hann, a nurse practitioner at Ninewells Hospital, Dundee, believes he picked up the infection at work.
Hes now got to stay inside, along with w… [+1741 chars]

articles.author: Flora Teoh
articles.title: Volunteer for U.K. COVID-19 vaccine trial Elisa Granato is alive, contrary to claim in viral article - Health Feedback
articles.description: The first volunteer for a U.K. COVID-19 vaccine trial Elisa Granato is not dead. This false claim has been widely spread by anti-vaccine groups, likely in an attempt to promote the idea that vaccines are dangerous.
articles.content: FULL CLAIM: "Elisa Granato, the first volunteer who availed herself in Oxford for a jab in the first Europe human trial of a vaccine to protect against the coronavirus pandemic has died. [...] Four other volunteer[s] are said to be battling complications due … [+2711 chars]
